title: Context-Based Science Vocabulary Acquisition Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate second-language proficiency and understanding of basic scientific terminology
context.additional_context: Project-based environment for vocabulary application in authentic scientific research contexts

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce specialized scientific terminology in context with over 80% accuracy
Learners can construct logical explanations using vocabulary in ten or more scientific research scenarios
During project presentations, learners appropriately use vocabulary acquired through second-language learning with over 90% frequency
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
